attributes.action: Make Donald Trump visit Finsbury Park Mosque during his 2019 state visit.
attributes.additional_details:
It has recently been announced that Donald Trump will be visiting the UK on an official state visit at the beginning of June. This should be taken as an opportunity to educate the leader of one of Britain's largest allies on the harm an anti-muslim agenda, which he has demonstrated multiple times as seen in the examples below, can have on a community. 

https://wapo.st/2Dts6hz

https://bit.ly/2TPyBVj
attributes.background: Donald Trump should visit the Finsbury Park Mosque during his 2019 state visit to learn of the harm that can be caused by anti-muslim rhetoric and interact with a community that celebrates it's multi-cultural routes.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the US Government and not the UK Government or Parliament.
